bill_title: provide for an interim study of the exemptions provided for the sales, use, and excise taxes imposed by the state.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for an interim study of the exemptions provided for the sales, use, and excise taxes imposed by the state. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council shall appoint an interim legislative committee to study the exemptions provided to the sales, use, and excise taxes imposed by the state. The committee shall devote special attention to the following: (1) The tangible personal property, services, and products transferred electronically that are exempt from the taxes imposed by the state; and (2) The organizations, nonprofits, and other entities that are exempt from taxes imposed by the state. The committee shall submit its findings, including legislative proposals and other recommendations, to the 2012 Legislature. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
